3_yohana:1:1: Ishimwe Yohana ashimira Gayo1.Jyewe Umukuru, ndakwandikiye Gayo ukundwa, uwo nkunda by’ukuri.
3_yohana:1:2: 2.Ukundwa, ndagusabira kugira ngo ugubwe neza muri byose, ube mutaraga nk’uko umutima wawe uguwe neza,
3_yohana:1:3: 3.kuko nishimiye cyane ubwo bene Data bazaga, bagahamya uburyo ushikamye mu kuri ukakugenderamo.
3_yohana:1:4: 4.Nta cyantera umunezero waruta uwo kumva ko abana banjye bagendera mu kuri.
3_yohana:1:5: 5.Ukundwa, ukiranuka mu byo ukorera bene Data byose kandi ari abashyitsi
3_yohana:1:6: 6.bahamije urukundo rwawe mu maso y’Itorero. Uzaba ugize neza nubaherekeza neza nk’uko bikwiriye ab’Imana,
3_yohana:1:7: 7.kuko bavuye iwabo ku bw’izina rya Yesu ari nta cyo bātse abanyamahanga.
3_yohana:1:8: 8.Ni cyo gituma dukwiriye kwakira neza abameze batyo, kugira ngo dufatanye gukorera ukuri.
3_yohana:1:9: Yohana arega Diyotirefe9.Hari icyo nandikiye Itorero, ariko Diyotirefe ushaka kuba ukomeye muri bo araturosera.
3_yohana:1:10: 10.Ni cyo gituma ubwo nzaza, nzabibutsa ibyo akora n’uko atuvuga amagambo mabi y’ubupfu, nyamara ibyo ntibimunyura ahubwo arengaho akanga no gucumbikira bene Data, n’ababishaka akababuza akabaca mu Itorero.
3_yohana:1:11: 11.Ukundwa, ntukīgane ikibi ahubwo wīgane icyiza. Ukora ibyiza ni we w’Imana, naho ukora ibibi ntiyari yabona Imana.
3_yohana:1:12: 12.Demeteriyo ahamywa na bose kandi n’ukuri ubwako kuramuhamya natwe turamuhamya, nawe uzi yuko ibyo duhamya ari iby’ukuri.
3_yohana:1:13: 13.Nari mfite byinshi byo kukwandikira ariko sinshaka kukwandikishiriza wino n’ikaramu,
3_yohana:1:14: 14.ahubwo niringiye kuzakubona vuba tukavugana duhanganye.
3_yohana:1:15: 15.Urasigare amahoro. Incuti ziragutashya. Untahirize incuti uzivuze mu mazina.
